references.paper_title: Language models are unsupervised multitask learners
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of large language models (LLMs), which are central to the proposed approach.
This paper introduced diffusion models, a core component of the proposed video generation method.
This paper demonstrates the few-shot learning capabilities of LLMs, making them effective for directing the generation process.
This paper details DreamFusion, which is leveraged to translate 2D diffusion model priors into 3D representations.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian splatting, a crucial technique for efficiently rendering high-fidelity 3D scenes in real-time.
